contrastsensitivity_calc.documentation: The inputs to the calculator object.

contrastsensitivity_calc.documentation: Spatial frequencies over which contrast sensitivity was measured

contrastsensitivity_calc.documentation: Sensitivity using Naka Rushton Model with N in equation

contrastsensitivity_calc.name: sensitivity_RBNS
contrastsensitivity_calc.documentation: Sensitivity using Naka Rushton Model with N and saturation in equation

contrastsensitivity_calc.name: is_modulated_response
contrastsensitivity_calc.documentation: 0/1 Is this a modulated or mean response? 0=not modulated, 1=modulated

contrastsensitivity_calc.documentation: Did the contrast responses for that spatial frequency vary across stimuli?

contrastsensitivity_calc.name: visual_response_p_bonferroni
contrastsensitivity_calc.documentation: Did responses vary across visual stimuli and blank?

contrastsensitivity_calc.name: response_varies_p_bonferroni
contrastsensitivity_calc.documentation: Did the response vary across stimuli? p-value
